{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=X3000 |revision=v1 |asin=B005G20VNS |fcc_date=07/08/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=AR7505ABW22 |manuf_rev=-A-88 |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=Q87-X3000 |ic_id=3839A-X3000 |pcb_id=141750520025J |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6361U |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWPA-25H |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM6361U |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bgn |addl_chips= |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=98:FC:11 |oui_eth=98:FC:11 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|region=in|model=X3000|pid=01t80000003prsTAAQ}} {{â€¢}} [http://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/userguide/1224669474250/X3000_UG_Full_EMEA_APAC_ANZ_CA_WEB,1.pdf User Guide] <!--{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_X3000}}-->
The default SSID may be '''CiscoXXXXX''' where '''XXXXX''' :is the last 5 digits of the router serial number. It is, however, configurable via ''[[Cisco]] Connect''.
*[http://www.redeszone.net/cisco-linksys/x3000/ Review on '''RedesZone'''] (w/ specs and internal images) :"RoHS P/N: 141750520025J REV: 01", "A084540A0", :and the ''[[Cisco]]'' logo is silkscreened on the board. :*[[Broadcom]] BCM6361UKFEBG WiSoC :*''Macronix'' MX25L12845EMI-10G Flash :*''EtronTech'' EM68B16CWPA-25H RAM :*[[Broadcom]] BCM53125SKMMLG GbE Switch :OUI: 98:FC:11
